label: Buyer ID
description: Unique identifier for the buyer/lessee.

label: Buyer Contact 1 First Name
description: First name of the primary contact person for the buyer.

label: Buyer Contact 1 Last Name
description: Last name of the primary contact person for the buyer.

label: Buyer Contact 1 Title
description: Job title or position of the primary contact person.

label: Buyer Contact 2 First Name
description: First name of the secondary contact person for the buyer.

label: Buyer Contact 2 Last Name
description: Last name of the secondary contact person for the buyer.

label: Buyer Contact 2 Title
description: Job title or position of the secondary contact person.

label: Buyer Company Name
description: Name of the buyer's company or organization.

label: Buyer Address Line 1
description: Primary street address of the buyer.

label: Buyer Address Line 2
description: Secondary address information (suite, unit, etc.).

label: Buyer City
description: City where the buyer is located.

label: Buyer State
description: State or province code where the buyer is located.

label: Buyer ZIP Code
description: Postal code for the buyer's address.

label: Buyer Phone
description: Primary phone number for the buyer.

label: Buyer Website
description: Primary website for the buyer.

label: Buyer Fax
description: Fax number for the buyer.

label: Buyer FIPS Code
description: Federal Information Processing Standards code for the buyer's county.

label: Buyer County
description: County where the buyer is located.

label: Buyer SIC Code
description: Standard Industrial Classification code for the buyer's industry.

label: Buyer Industry Description
description: Description of the buyer's industry based on SIC code.

label: Buyer DUNS Number
description: Dun & Bradstreet identification number for the buyer.

label: UCC Filing ID
description: Unique identifier for the UCC filing.

label: UCC Transaction ID
description: Transaction identifier associated with the UCC filing.

label: UCC Filing Date
description: Date when the UCC filing was recorded.

label: UCC Date of Lease Acquisition
description: Date of Lease Acquisition

label: UCC Filing Status
description: Current status of the UCC filing (e.g., active, lapsed, amended).

label: UCC Lienholder
description: Name of the party holding the lien in the UCC filing.

label: UCC Comment
description: Additional comments or notes related to the UCC filing.

label: UCC FIPS Code
description: Federal Information Processing Standards code for the UCC filing location.

label: UCC Batch Number
description: Batch number for processing the UCC filing.

label: Service Provider ID
description: Unique identifier for the service provider.

label: Service Provider Class
description: Classification or category of the service provider.

label: Service Provider Company
description: Name of the service provider company.

label: Service Provider City
description: City where the service provider is located.

label: Service Provider State
description: State or province code for the service provider.

label: Assignee ID
description: Unique identifier for the assignee.

label: Assignee Class
description: Classification or category of the assignee.

label: Assignee Company
description: Name of the assignee company or organization.

label: Assignee City
description: City where the assignee is located.

label: Assignee State
description: State or province code for the assignee.

label: Equipment Unit
description: Unit of measure for the equipment (e.g., unit, piece, lot).

label: Equipment UCC Year
description: Year associated with the UCC filing for the equipment.

label: Equipment Number
description: Internal unique identifier for the equipment.

label: Equipment Manufacturer
description: Name of the company that manufactured the equipment.

label: Equipment Model
description: Model name or number of the equipment.

label: Equipment Description
description: Detailed description of the equipment.

label: Equipment Code
description: Standardized or internal code identifying the equipment type.

label: Equipment Serial Number
description: Serial number or unique identifying number for the equipment.

label: Equipment Size
description: Size, capacity, or physical measurement of the equipment.

label: Equipment End Year
description: End year for the lease or term of the equipment.

label: Equipment Attachment
description: Attachment identifier linking the equipment to related documents.

label: Equipment Value
description: Declared dollar value of the equipment.

label: Equipment Adverse Event Flag
description: Indicates whether an adverse event is associated with the equipment.

label: Custom Field 1
description: User-defined custom field for additional data.

label: Custom Field 2
description: User-defined custom field for additional data.
